question: What is the butterfly symbol that appears after Max makes a choice?

choices.A: A notification that the choice is irreversible
choices.B: A symbol of Max's time rewind power
choices.C: A sign that the choice will have consequences
choices.D: A hint that the choice is insignificant

choices.A: Nathan is suspended from Blackwell Academy
choices.B: Max is suspended from Blackwell Academy
choices.C: Nathan confronts Max at the parking lot
choices.D: Nathan leaves a threatening message in Max's room

choices.A: Principal Wells admits that he doesn't believe her accusation
